name: padoru
description:
padoru HASHIRE SORI YO
KAZE NO YOU NI
TSUKIMIHARA WO
PADORU PADORU
— Nero Claudius Caesar Augustus Germanicus, the 5th emperor of Rome.

Help Slkoshka find all watermelon presents for good kids as quickly as possible.

System requirements
  • Potato with DirectX 10 support
  • Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10, or Windows 11
Controls Gamepad
  • Walk: D-pad left/right or left stick 
  • Jump: A
Keyboard
  • Walk: A/D or Left/Right arrow keys
  • Jump: W, Up arrow, or Space
Thanks to
  • ennme for the character art
Have questions/issues?

Send me a DM on Twitter: @Slkoshka

Changelog

1.0.0 (2022-12-24)
Initial release.
